text: The Qujing International Challenger is a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Qujing, China since 2018. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year ! style="width:200px;"|Champion ! style="width:200px;"|Runner-up ! style="width:175px;"|Score |- | 2018 || Malek Jaziri || Blaž Rola || 7–6(7–5), 6–1 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year ! style="width:200px;"|Champions ! style="width:200px;"|Runners-up ! style="width:175px;"|Score |- | 2018 || Aliaksandr Bury Peng Hsien-yin || Wu Di Zhang Ze || 6–7(3–7), 6–4, [12–10] |} Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in China Category:Qujing
title: Qujing International Challenger
